attributes.description:
Very clean and well looked after with all VW Services.



Polo Vivo 1.4 delivering 55kW – Trendline - Clean -one owner - upgrading to new car.

This car has been well cared for and all services done by VW.

This sale is handled by Konrad  Plse contact me on 0832755626 or konrad@ljrauto.co.zaI AA Dekra roadworthy Finance available Trade-ins welcome Vehicle in Durbanville Area
The entry engine in the Polo Vivo model range is the 1.4-liter with the 55 kW power output available 4800rpm. This engine has ample power and torque for dynamic and everyday driving. From 3750rpm, the engine peaks at 130 Nm. In addition to its lively performance, the 1.4-liter engine has impressive fuel consumption of 5.7 liters per 100 kilometres
rest of 3 year warranty
